name: Horizons Unlimited of San Francisco, Inc
description: Horizons is a One-Stop Shop for our community, offering a variety of culturally-rooted and high appeal services and programs for youth and families. Our history is a testament to the quality and success of our programs, and acts as a platform for continued efforts to create new programs and strategies to transform lives and achieve desired outcomes. We offer over 15 innovative and evidenced-based programs, in Spanish and English, to more than 5,000 unduplicated clients per annum through on and o
